movies.Title: Psycho
movies.Actors: Anthony Perkins, Vera Miles, John Gavin, Janet Leigh
movies.Plot: A Phoenix secretary steals $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 5 nominations.

movies.Title: American History X
movies.Actors: Edward Norton, Edward Furlong, Beverly D'Angelo, Jennifer Lien
movies.Plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 9 nominations.

movies.Title: City Lights
movies.Actors: Virginia Cherrill, Florence Lee, Florence Lee, Harry Myers
movies.Plot: The Tramp struggles to help a blind flower girl he has fallen in love with.

movies.Title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.Actors: Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns, Barry Pepper
movies.Plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
